stories.text:
Hey folks!
I want to refurbish my old dusty blog into something new and fancy but without (too many) late nights fighting with yet another static site generator. I want to write more about my experiences working with ML so ideally this would be a tech stack that can easily accommodate maths formulae (nice if it can be a syntax close to LaTeX but I'm not super picky) and interactive graphs (something like a Jupyter notebook widget).
Do you have a setup that works well and that you'd like to share? Thanks in advance!
stories.title: Ask HN: Best stack for ML blog with lots of code snippets, formulae and graphs?
